title: A mutual control problem for semilinear system via fixed point approach
abstract:
In this paper, we introduce and discuss the concept of a mutual control
problem. Our analysis relies on a vector fixed-point approach based on the
fixed-point theorems of Perov, Schauder, Leray-Schauder, and Avramescu.
Additionally, for a related semi-observability problem, we employ a novel
technique utilizing Bielecki equivalent norms.
